item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Hook contains all the information needed to add a hook into a server/Virtual provision and os reload. Local accountId The ID of the account the script belongs to. Type: integer createDate Type: dateTime id Type: integer modifyDate Type: dateTime name The name of the hook. Type: string
